description: This course provides supplemental instruction in reading, writing, and critical thinking
in conjunction with a designated course.  Students practice reading course-specific
texts, focusing writing topics, writing essay and short answer exams, developing research
habits, indentifying and using discipline-specific sources, and writing for general and
specific audiences.  Supplemental assignments complement writing in the designated
course. P/N only. May be repeated once with a different designated
course. Prerequisite: concurrent enrollment in a designated full-credit course.
